title: Content Curation Platform
problem: Information overload makes it difficult for users to find high-quality, relevant content. Manual discovery and filtering are time-consuming.
goals: Help users discover and save curated content
Use AI to rank and recommend articles
Allow users to share personalized content feeds
key_features: Browser extension for saving and annotating articles
constraints: Must support mobile and desktop browsers
Content sources limited to RSS, Twitter, and open news APIs
